snippet.title: Shift Happens | Release Trailer | Xbox One, PS4 and PC | Out Now
snippet.description:
Shift Happens - True couch co-op gaming for family, friends & couples!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/359840 

Key Features:
- Test your friendship and co-op skills with truly cooperative gameplay. 
- Play with friends in either local or online multiplayer modes.
- Conquer more than 40 levels in co-op mode.
- Complete 30 single-player levels designed specifically for solo players.
- Uncover extra challenges and rewards while playing.


Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shifthappensgame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bismoandplom
Presskit:
http://presskit.klonk-games.com/sheet.php?p=shift_happens

Further information about Shift Happens is available on the offical website.
Official website of Shift Happens: http://shifthappensgame.com/
Official website of Klonk Games: http://www.klonk-games.de/
Official website ofn Deck13: http://www.deck13.com
